title: 310. Are We Running Out of Ideas?
description: Economists have a hard time explaining why productivity growth has been shrinking. One theory: true innovation has gotten much harder – and much more expensive. So what should we do next?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
